title: TiVo
description: TiVo's color palette is composed of vibrant and contrasting hues with blue (#00A7E1) as the primary color, reflecting innovation and trust. Black (#000000) and white (#FFFFFF) provide a classic, modern base, while grays (#63666A, #C8C9C7) offer depth and balance. These colors are known from the TiVo Brand Guidelines, ensuring consistency in their branding approach across various platforms.
